member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1.GetFontFallback
member.summary: Gets the current fallback. If none was ever set since creating the layout, it will be nullptr.
member.param: Contains an address of a pointer to the current font fallback object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1.GetLastLineWrapping
member.summary: Gets the wrapping mode of the last line.
member.returns: Returns FALSE if the last line is not wrapped; TRUE if the last line is wrapped.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1.GetOpticalAlignment
member.summary: Gets the optical margin alignment for the text format.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1.GetVerticalGlyphOrientation
member.summary: Get the preferred orientation of glyphs when using a vertical reading direction.
member.returns: The preferred orientation of glyphs when using a vertical reading direction.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1.SetFontFallback
member.summary: Applies the custom font fallback onto the layout. If none is set, it uses the default system fallback list.
member.param: The font fallback to apply to the layout.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1.SetLastLineWrapping
member.summary: Sets the wrapping mode of the last line.

param.name: isLastLineWrappingEnabled
param.para: If set to FALSE, the last line is not wrapped. If set to TRUE, the last line is wrapped.
The last line is wrapped by default.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1.SetOpticalAlignment

summary.para: Sets the optical margin alignment for the text format.

By default, glyphs are aligned to the margin by the default origin and side-bearings of the glyph. If you specify DWRITE_OPTICAL_ALIGNMENT_USING_SIDE_BEARINGS, then the alignment Suses the side bearings to offset the glyph from the aligned edge to ensure the ink of the glyphs are aligned.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1.SetVerticalGlyphOrientation
member.summary: Sets the orientation of a text format.
member.param: The orientation to apply to the text format.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextFormat1
member.summary: Describes the font and paragraph properties used to format text, and it describes locale information. This interface has all the same methods as and adds the ability for you to apply an explicit orientation.
